meanings.sent1: Erythrocytes are important for carrying oxygen in the blood.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can examine erythrocytes under a microscope to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The erythrocytes in the body work hard every day to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of blood, erythrocytes are like tiny red boats transporting oxygen.
meanings.sent5: The erythrocytes move swiftly through the bloodstream, like little oxygen delivery trucks.

meanings.definition: Blood cells that contain hemoglobin and carry oxygen to tissues
meanings.sent1: Erythrocytes play a crucial role in delivering oxygen to all parts of the body.
meanings.sent2: When erythrocytes are low, a person may feel tired and weak.
meanings.sent3: During exercise, erythrocytes work overtime to supply muscles with oxygen.
meanings.sent4: The erythrocytes are like tiny oxygen-filled balloons floating through the bloodstream.
meanings.sent5: The importance of erythrocytes in keeping us alive cannot be overstated.
